fields.headline: Best offers
fields.bodyText: Under £200 France: Book by April 30 for travel before May 31 and one night's B&B in Paris with return Eurostar travel costs £85pp from Eurostar Holidays Direct (0870 1676767). Two nights from £110pp and three from £115pp. Upgrade to first-class travel £40pp extra (saving £37). Holland: For Friday departures up to March 22, three nights' B&B at the four-star Delft Museumhotel costs £143pp with Eurotunnel Motoring Holidays (0870 3332001) including Eurotunnel crossing for car and passengers. Isle of Wight: Two nights' half-board at the Royal Hotel in Ventnor costs from £154pp from Red Funnel (0870 4448890) including return car ferry crossings from Southampton to Cowes. Czechoslovakia: ebookers (0870 0433861) is offering two nights' B&B at the Duo Hotel, Prague, from £165pp including return British Airways flights from Heathrow and taxes. Regional departures available at a supplement. Under £400 Belgium: During the May 24-27 Jazz Marathon, VFB Holidays (01242 240310) is offering three nights' B&B at the Jolly Hotel du Grand Sablon in Brussels from £235pp with Dover-Calais car-ferry crossing or £248pp with Eurostar direct to Brussels. Also included is a bracelet providing free entry to all the marathon's cafés, concert halls, and open-air concerts and fully comprehensive travel insurance. Spain: Three nights' B&B from February 15 at the four-star Emperador Hotel in Madrid costs £298pp (£89 off the brochure price) including BA flights from Gatwick. Cresta Holidays (0870 1610950). Italy: Book by February 14 and seven nights' self-catering from March 28 in a mobile home at Camping Norcenni (15 miles from Rome) costs £326 for a family of two adults and up to four children. Canvas Holidays (01383 629000). Price includes return midweek Dover/Calais ferry crossing for car and passengers. Cyprus: During the February Mardi Gras, a week at the three-star Alasia Hotel costs from £369 per adult and £336 per child including flights, and transfers. Sunvil Holidays (020-8568 4499). US: Until March 22, four nights' B&B at the Ramada Inn in Nashville, Tennessee, costs £399pp (£54 off the brochure price) from America Direct (0870 8890827). The price includes return Delta flight from Gatwick or Manchester and a paddle-steamer cruise. Under £1,000 Spain: Learn to tango in Granada during the International Festival of Tango. £410pp (two sharing) from Dance Holidays (01293 527722) including return scheduled flights Stansted-Malaga and transfers, seven nights' B&B from March 4, and six hours' tuition. Portugal: Departing February 22, seven nights' B&B at the five-star Estalagem Senhora Da Guia in Cascais, west of Lisbon, costs £485pp, saving £50pp (children under 12 £349). Price includes scheduled flights and private transfers. Cadogan Holidays (023-8082 8313). US: For Thursday departures until April 30 (excluding Easter), three nights' room-only at the three-star Renoir Hotel in San Francisco and four nights' room-only at the three-star Sahara Hotel in Las Vegas costs £495 from Bon Voyage (0800 3160194) including return scheduled flights from Heathrow or Manchester and internal flights. Book by February 28. Majorca: For departures between February 23 and March 21, seven nights' half-board at the four-star Hotel Illa d'Or in Port de Pollença costs £536pp (two sharing) including return flights from Gatwick and private transfers. Castaways (01737 812255). Bolivia: Departing La Paz on June 29, a 20-night exploration through the Andean Altiplano to the cloud forests of the Amazon costs £550pp plus $295 kitty with Encounter, (01728 862222). The price includes camping and hostel accommodation (35%/65%), all camp meals, transport aboard an all-terrain vehicle and expert guidance. International flights extra. Canary Islands: A week's walking in Tenerife from February 24 costs £595pp from Waymark Holidays (01753 516 477) including return flights from Gatwick, transfers, half-board accommodation at the four-star Hotel Valle Mar plus the services of an English-speaking leader. Over £1,000 US: New England Vacations (01582 469771) is offering a 14-night multi-centre break to Cape Cod, Rhode Island, Vermont and Maine. £1,145pp (two sharing) including flights, accommodation and car hire. Portugal: Lote 8, a villa in Quinta do Lago on the Algarve, sleeps up to 10 and costs from £2,345 in total for a week. The Villa Agency (01392 424400). Flights and car hire can also be arranged on request. Argentina: Last Frontiers (01296 653000) has cut £500 off the price of its 13-day holidays departing between March 1 and June 30. Now £2,485pp, including all international and internal flights and transfers, three nights' B&B at the five-star Alvear Palace Hotel in Buenos Aires, three nights' B&B in the Lake District at the Llao Llao Hotel and three nights' half-board in the Los Glaciares National Park at the Estancia Alta Vista.
